General.Name: Transforma Resources Corp
General.Description: Transforma Resources Corporation, an exploration stage company, engages in the acquisition and exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for copper and molybdenum deposits. It owns a 100% interest in the Thunder Copper Property situated in southwestern British Columbia. It also holds an option to acquire the MAC Property located in British Columbia. The company was formerly known as Cresval Capital Corp. and changed its name to Transforma Resources Corporation in October 2021. Transforma Resources Corporation was incorporated in 2001 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1985 Bellevue Avenue, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7V 1B6
